settings.text:
We accept digital payments – Debit or Credit Car, both local and internationally accredited – and payment through mobile banking available – Bkash, Nagad, Rocket etc.

Our integrated payment gateway system offers secure and faster payment for you. Rest assured, your data is secured, and your privacy is protected.

Payment options:

  • MASTER CARD
  • VISA CARD
  • DISCOVER

Mobile Banking:

  • Bkash
  • Nagad
  • Rocket

We also offer Cash on Delivery Service all over Bangladesh

To proceed for payment click on the "Proceed to Pay" button > Select a payment option before clicking the "Confirm order".

After confirming the order and completing the payment, you will get a confirmation notification from the App and by SMS/email to let you know that the order is successfully placed.
